attributes.action: Ban Channel 5 from showing Football highlights
attributes.background: Football League Tonight is awful, make it stop

rejection.details:
Decisions about individual programmes on a particular TV channel are not made by the Government or by the House of Commons.

You could complain directly to Channel 5: customerservices@channel5.com

Alternatively, you could try complaining to the organisation that regulates UK television channels, Ofcom. You can find out more about the kinds of complaints that Ofcom can look at here: http://consumers.ofcom.org.uk/complain/
